001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.SupportedDevices;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetTempRateResponse;
012
013/**
014 * Sets a temp rate for basal delivery. Note that ControlIQ must be off before setting a temp rate.
015 */
016/**
017 * Sets a temp rate for basal delivery. Note that ControlIQ must be off before setting a temp rate.
018 *
019
020 *
021 * <br>
022 *
023 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetTempRateResponse}, opCode -92, size 6
024 *
025 * <br>
026 *
027 * 
028 * <table border='1'>
029 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
030 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-92</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
031 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>6</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
032 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
033 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>modifiesInsulinDelivery</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>minApi</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion#MOBI_API_V3_5}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>supportedDevices</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.SupportedDevices#MOBI_ONLY}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetTempRateResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * </table>
040 */@MessageProps(
041    opCode=-92,
042    size=6, // 30 with signed
043    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
044    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
045    signed=true,
046    modifiesInsulinDelivery=true,
047    minApi=KnownApiVersion.MOBI_API_V3_5,
048    supportedDevices=SupportedDevices.MOBI_ONLY,
049    response=SetTempRateResponse.class
050)
051public class SetTempRateRequest extends Message {
052
053    private int minutes;
054    private int percent;
055    
056    public SetTempRateRequest() {}
057
058    public SetTempRateRequest(byte[] raw) {
059        parse(raw);
060    }
061
062    public static int MIN_MINUTES = 15;
063    public static int MAX_MINUTES = 72 * 60;
064
065    public static int MIN_PERCENT = 0;
066    public static int MAX_PERCENT = 250;
067
068
069    /**
070     * Sets a temp rate for basal delivery.
071     *
072     * @param minutes between 15 minutes and 72 hours. durations shorter than 15 minutes are not supported and the pump will return an error
073     * @param percent between 0 percent and 250 percent. values above 250% are not supported and the pump will return an error
074     */
075    public SetTempRateRequest(int minutes, int percent) {
076        Validate.isTrue(minutes >= MIN_MINUTES && minutes <= MAX_MINUTES, "duration of temp rate must be between 15 and 4,320 minutes (72 hours)");
077        Validate.isTrue(percent >= MIN_PERCENT && percent <= MAX_PERCENT, "percent temp rate must be between 0-250%");
078        this.cargo = buildCargo(minutes, percent);
079        this.minutes = minutes;
080        this.percent = percent;
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * <table border="1">
085     * <caption>Parsed fields for SetTempRateRequest:</caption>
086     * <tr><td><code>minutes</code></td><td><code>Math.toIntExact(Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0) / 1000 / 60)</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td><code>percent</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
088     * </table>
089     */
090    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
091        raw = this.removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
092        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
093        this.cargo = raw;
094        this.minutes = Math.toIntExact(Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0) / 1000 / 60);
095        this.percent = Bytes.readShort(raw, 4);
096    }
097
098    
099    /**
100     * <table border="1">
101     * <caption>Byte layout for SetTempRateRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
102     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
103     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint32(minutes * 1000L * 60L) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
104     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint32(minutes * 1000L * 60L) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
105     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(minutes * 1000L * 60L) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
106     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(minutes * 1000L * 60L) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
107     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(percent) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
108     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(percent) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
109     * </table>
110     */
111    public static byte[] buildCargo(int minutes, int percent) {
112        return Bytes.combine(
113                Bytes.toUint32(minutes * 1000L * 60L),
114                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(percent)
115        );
116    }
117
118
119    public int getMinutes() {
120        return minutes;
121    }
122
123    public int getPercent() {
124        return percent;
125    }
126}
